Profile

From Falcon, Venezuela (GMT-4:00)

Hi, I am a web developer currently I am more focused on the frontend area. With more than 2 years learning in a self-taught way mostly with online courses and putting these knowledge into practice through dev challleges. I consider myself a neat, curious, communicative person, and above all passionate about programming.

Below you will see all my skills and my work done on the web, I hope you like it!
